short_summary: Construction of laboratory for heavy vehicles
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) to manage the construction of a laboratory building for research on heavy vehicles at the Motor Vehicle Test Centre (MVTC) in Blainville.
tags: construction of laboratory building for heavy vehicles
full_summary:
----------------
### EF997-240565 - AE - Construction of a laboratory for commercial vehicles (CVL) at the MVTC

**Reference Number:** WS4147871185-Doc4147898871  
**Solicitation Number:** WS4147871185  
**Publication Date:** 2023-08-15  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-16T14:00:00
### Contract Details

*   This call was issued under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).
*   The solicitation is for a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) to construct a laboratory for commercial vehicles at the Motor Vehicle Test Centre (MVTC) in Blainville.
*   The contract start date is not specified, with an expected completion date of 2025-03-31.
*   All labor and deliverables will be managed and executed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
*   The selected proponent will receive a LIRF contract.
### Contract Documents

*   Bid document available upon request.
*   All communications and documents must be provided in English and/or French.

### Solicitation Documents

*   Solicitation documents and additional information are available through the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17170764?extsite=MTcxNzA3NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Contact Information
